ygData.subject: Re: Alcohol Tolerance
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Warriors Given my performance on my gig last night - Going from the first set to second set - I would agree with you.  Going from the second set to third
ygData.messageBody:
> From: "Dan Bouchard" <dbouch@...>
>
> In a Bards case, alcohol tolerance, IMHO should actually INCREASE the
> effects of our songs. For instance, when I was playing in a band I played
> 100 times better when I was completely hammered. In the sense Verant is
> using it, being drunk seems to enhance a characters specialty (ie.
Warriors

Given my performance on my gig last night - Going from the first set to
second set - I would agree with you. Going from the second set to third
set - I would have to disagree! It would be cool to have them track level
of inebriation - once you have a nice buzz going - you do better - but once
you get past a certain point - it would drastically decrease.

It would be especially realistic - if they had the GUI - "lie" to you - so
that YOU think you're doing better - but everyone else (at least the sober
ones) know that you're worse!

Slyde of Xegony
